page.title: 01 SUMMARY OF OUR AREA
page.content: OUR BLOCK COVERS THE VILLAGES OF OCCOLD AND BRAISEWORTH. OCCOLD IS A BUSY VILLAGE WITH A SHOP,PUB,VILLAGE HALL CHURCH AND CHAPEL AT ITS CENTRE. BRAISEWORTH IS A QUIET VILLAGE JUST OFF THE MAIN IPSWICH TO NORWICH ROAD. BRAISEWORTH IS MAINLY FARMLAND WITH ISOLATED FARMHOUSES. ONE FARMER GROWS HOPS. NEAR TO THE RIVER DOVE ARABLE LAND HAS MANY DITCHES AS IT WAS MARSH LAND. THERE ARE AREAS OF WOODLAND GOOD FOR WILDLIFE. WE HAVE TWO DAIRY HERDS IN OUR BLOCK, SINCE QUOTAS TWO OTHER HERDS NEARBY HAVE BEEN SOLD.THERE HAVE BEEN RECENT CHANGES. BRAISEWORTH CHURCH BUILT ABOUT 1900 HAS NOW CLOSED, EYE PARK FARM IS FOR SALE AFTER BEING IN THE SAME FAMILY FOR YEARS AND ALSO THE FARM HAS BEEN SOLD AWAY FROM THE KERRISON SCHOOL. A RURAL AREA BUT PLENTY OF INTEREST.
